title: Voice-Overs (Tuesday Crossword, August 15)
What The Board Needs To Know
description: Everything from the week beginning August 14, 2023, that a corporate board director needs to know ahead of a board meeting. This week we look at an update to the most widely used cybersecurity framework now recognizes the role governance plays in addressing cyber risk. Plus: changes to D&O policies in the wake of the new SEC rule could leave some companies exposed to legal risk; why proactive threat hunting can find problems before they cause damage and disruption; and increasing interest from regulators in where personal data is being sent.
